item.description:
@ddz_spez wrote:

I see - look[0] = 264; // Hair
look[1] = 16; // Beard
look[2] = 18; // Torso
look[3] = 26; // Arms
look[4] = 34; // Bracelets
look[5] = 38; // Legs
look[6] = 42; // Shoes
colour[2] = 16;
colour[1] = 16;
for(int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
colour[2] = 21;
colour[1] = 21;
colour[0] = 2;

And i want to change but idk what the numbers are for the colors and the looks. Helo plox
